text: shri lanka pile hitapu puhunukaruwaku wana ga්raham fong mahatha puhunukaru dhurayata pathkirimata ka්rikat aayathanaya mita pera sakachchua karamin sitiya da ee mahathage ekangathawa labi nomathi bawa wartha we.
sardari aanduwa ha shreshtadhikaranaya athara athi gatuma pilibandawa pakisthana hamudawa nam nihandaya.
ada ara bretnwud giwisumath naha.
"ee gamana ubath patan gaththada mage kuttama thalanna.
aayathana hayak hathak pamana adangukota mila kandawau athara aduma milaganan idiripath kara thibune wenath aayathanayakini.
me gataluwata wisandumak apata thibune naha.”mathiws ese kiwath eya ese wiya nohakiya.
obamayi saminde -
ohu ge birinda niwasata wi siti.
ewannak piliganima wuwa wadagath jayagrahanayaki.

pasugiyada nalaka godahewage “wipathmaga” saha madagoda abhaya thissage “eeliya” athara athi janapriya wime satane prathipalayak lesa wipath maga niyojanaya karana gotabhaya rajapaksha saha kamal gunarathna athulu kathikayan kala prakashayan pasugiya sathiya purama kathabahata lakwu athara ema prakashayan hethuwen eekabaddhaye jyeshtayan kihipa denekuma siya aprasadaya hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha wethada palakara thibe.

oya kiyana makswada labben godanagapu kisima ratak wath aduma gane gammanayakwath naha.stalinge rajya dhanawadi sankalpa sahitha dadi eekadhipathi palanaya nisa balagathu rusiyawakuth den kshaoo pen ge buddhimath rajya dhanawadi sankalpa nisa dhanawath chinayakuth fidel alyendro kasthro-rus sahodarayage mahajana hithamithrawadi kramaya nisa kiyubawath rakuna misak oya kiyana kehelmal makswadaya kiyana wigadamenwath ooka mathurana bahuthara wammun ho hitapu wammun kiyana kalakannin wath lokayata dun melo magulak naha.lankawe wammun kiyaganna/ ho hitapu wammun kiyana kalakannin ekko wasudewage sita wirawansa dakwa apathayin men pasugiya antha dushitha rejimayata kade yathi, nathahoth unta nodeweni wathman antha dushitha yahapalana rejimayata sochchamak wenuwen wili lajja nathuwa hirikitha lesa kambaurathi.

ithin onna thattu deke gedarak thiyanawa dilisi dilisi.paththaka ____ salun kiyala bod thadiyakuth dala thibuna.kalin wage kol kala.lalanawak salun katahadakin kaddenma mata kotagena kotagena giya,math atha ariye na.magen ganak kiyala ahuwa masekata ee ganakata puluwanda kiyala.mata pu__nuth ekka hina giya.man me joliyata bodim balanawa me yodhi magulak kathakaranawa.mama apoyi puluwan kiwuwa........tika welawakin yathuru karallakuth agillen karakawa karakawa lalanawa aawa.awith mata kamarawala dorawal arala pennuwa.man eeth hanikata kamarawalata ebila baluwa.ayi ithin ee manussaya kiwwa ganan wala hatiyata mata hithune kamare raththaran tayilwath allalada kiyala.lalanawa magen wisthara ahuwa man ithin hanganne nathuwa kinda manda kage kawuda aththama kiwuwa,wisthara ahuwa witharayi lalanawage kata puduma widiyata palal une.mata dath 64ma pennuwe nathi eka witharayi.passe puduma oona kamak athi una mawa nathara kara ganna.ganath adu karannam kiwuwa.eeth ithin ee manussaya mama dakune bawath loke kala wathura bipu ambattayek bawath danna ekakya.ithin man me bodima baluwe yaluwekta kiyala mage pathiwruthawath rakan ikmanata maru una.
